name: Forest Trail
description:
You and your friends were out playing in the woods, and something happened.   You're not quite sure what, dark clouds and mist came from the direction of the village, so you ran.

Running blindly through the dark forest, you realise that you are lost, and you're separated from your friends.

Welcome to the Forest Trail

Forest Trail is a maze game where you have to navigate your person/people through the maze to the exit points.

Controls

There are three control modes available:

  • Mouse or Touch
    • Click/touch in the direction you want to go, relative to the current selected person
    • Click/touch on another person to select them (if they're away)
  • Keyboard
    • WASD or arrow keys to send the current selected person in that direction
    • Number keys to change selections

General rules;

  • You can change selections while some one is moving
  • You can bump into someone to wake them or give them things

This first release has the first 20 levels,  the more people who play the game and provide feedback to more motivated I'll be to add more levels.   For now levels will be added to the base version, not through DLC or additional purchases, however the price will rise every time a new level set is added
